body.name: OMAIGA Cordless Iron, 1500W Cordless Iron with Steam with 11.84ozs Water Tank, Anti Drip Iron Cordless with Ceramic Soleplate, Cordless Iron for Clothes with 3 Temperature Settings-Red
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 59 mins
features: UPGRADE DESIGN-OMAIGA 1500W Cordless clothes steam iron provides up to 60 seconds of continuous heat and steam in cordless mode and quickly reheats in just 25 seconds when placed back on its base. The professional steam iron you can use it more easily and quickly without the limitations of twisted wires, knotted wires, or getting stuck on the ironing board. Powerful burst of steam delivers an extra blast of steam, allowing you to removing wrinkles quickly and easily.

SELF-CLEANING & ANTI-CALC-Cordless steam iron have self-cleaning function, remove deposits to maintain performance and increase the iron's lifespan. Only need to presse the self-clean button, you can try the burst-of-steam feature to clean vents. When the temperature of your steam iron is insufficient to create steam, the supply of water is cut off automatically to avoid any drips from the soleplate.

RAPID AND EFFICIENT-Ceramic Soleplate of this steam iron equips advanced technology which can provide even and steam to quickly remove wrinkles of clothes, and the vertical steam function of iron cordless is not only suitable for horizontal ironing, also for ironing the hanging clothes vertically. Soleplate of our cordless iron is designed with a tapered tip for multi directional ironing, use on shirt collars or in the thin spaces between buttons with pinpoint precision.

NOT A USED IRON-Every steam iron needs to pass a functional TEST before going to the market, to prevent product quality problems from causing trouble to customers. So it is NORMAL when you see some WATER left in its tank. If you have any questions about this iron, please feel free to contact us, a one-year warranty is guaranteed.

WIDE APPLICATION-Steam iron is equipped with 3 temperature settings, allowing for use on a variety of fabrics including Nylon,Wool,linen, cotton, silk, wool, synthetic and so on. The advanced cordless iron provides the optimal temperature for every type of clothing, unlike other one-temperature irons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I still iron unlike so many others nowadays. Not every time I do laundry, but I iron certain items every time they’re washed and I’ve always hated the cord messing up my work. This iron solves the problem beautifully. The only disadvantage I’ve found is that it cools more quickly than a corded iron and you have place it back on it’s pedestal every time, but it heats up just as quickly so it’s not annoying. It’s lightweight and smooth. Just about perfect for me. I even bought one for my sister!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working but manufacturer was helpful
reviews.reviewText: I have used the iron daily since July. It has been six months and the iron completely stopped working. Lights come on but no heat. Omaiga customer support reached out to me after i left my review and we were able to resolve this. I have enjoyed using the cordless iron, i quilt, having an iron ready when i am and where i want it is such a blessing. I will purchase from Omaiga

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks really nice but you must put the iron back on the base to heat the iron back up. It doesn’t stay hot for the entire garment to be ironed. But where you iron while it’s hot it works perfectly. No cord attached to the iron so very versatile. Weight is sufficient not to heavy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If I could leave 0 stars I would. First off the whole minute worth of ironing and 25 sec charge Time..... not only is that asinine but inaccurate. More like 20 secs of heat and 30 secs charge. Leakproof ? Not on your life kid. Leaks everywhere. Great concept but horrible execution. Glad I didn't throw away the iron it was "replacing" that one been running strong for almost 8 years just hated the cord ..... after this garbage I have a new found appreciation for that minor inconvenience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I ordered
reviews.reviewText: Love cordless irons. I have used one for years, then my Ex took it with them. Once you are aware of the limitations, they are fantastic. It takes approximately 19 seconds to reheat between uses. The steam function is phenomenal. As a quilter, this is perfect for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You made a charging port that doesn't hold a charge
reviews.reviewText: When the R&D dept made this product, did they think it was a good idea to make a wireless iron that didn't hold a charge, or a charging platform that hardly charged anything, then go and mislead the consumers?I used it the other day to iron a couple of work shirts out to beta test it. I left it on the charger a few days prior for a few hours. I came home and the charging platform was still blue. I thought, will maybe it had a low charge to begin with. I took it off the charging port and looked for the on button...there was no on button. I put it back on the charger and then saw the green on symbol, i thought maybe it was touch screen "on" button...So I started ironing and then after about a minute of doing the back of the shirt and then the sleeve it started losing heat and it wasn't steaming anything after two presses from the steam button. So I put it back on the charging port and moved the shirt around, it began getting hot, and then it sank in...This iron goes off the charger in order to get hot. I thought, well this is stupid, and then remembered I should of read the reviews. I'll probably end up getting a wired iron later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Let it charge for a second before using…after that…smooth, liquid, gold

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024

reviews.reviewerName: I didn’t receive this order and it’s tells me it was delivered to my address. I will never order from this company again! And I’m unable to contact them.

reviews.reviewText: Aunque aún no me adapto a la temperatura ideal para usarla con mi ropa en general, es de muy buen a calidad y con demasiada practicidad
